conversation.content: I want to find comfortable and durable socks for extended wear in work and casual settings. within my expected price range: [20.7, 29.99]

Based on your budget range, I recommend the GOLDTOE Men's Harrington Crew Socks. These socks are priced at $14.97 and are known for their comfort, durability, and style. If you decide to purchase these socks, I also suggest considering the potentially purchasable candidate: <GOLDTOE Men's Harrington Crew Socks, Multipairs> (B0C15R4WD1) which is designed to keep your feet feeling their best throughout the day.

I'm interested in the GOLDTOE Men's Harrington Crew Socks you recommended. Can you provide more details about their comfort, durability, and any specific features that make them suitable for extended wear in work and casual settings?

The GOLDTOE Men's Harrington Crew Socks are designed to provide comfort, durability, and style for extended wear in work and casual settings. They feature AquaFX Moisture Control technology to keep your feet feeling soft and dry, premium yarns with spandex for a perfect fit, and GOLDTOE's iconic reinforced toe and full cushioning for added comfort. These socks are priced at $14.97 and are a great choice within your budget range. If you decide to purchase these socks, I recommend also considering the potentially purchasable candidate: People Socks Women's Modern (B0C3GBP2C5) which offer quality merino wool at a bargain price and are designed for everyday wear with reinforced toe and heel for added durability.
